summary: this add the college of soldiers which had  many new quests to do
descriptionHtml:
hello im Skull 19971 and this is my mod number 13 im so happy that i created 
it and this is one of my best mods 
it add a new school the college of soldier which have new quests and new clans just like companion imperials stormcloak thalmor ...... new 10 clans its just like the college of winterhold and a clans with the name
1) Sparta    had 300 soldier with sparta clothes just like the film 
2) Nord Hero had 300 soldier with the best armor and weapon
3) Darck wizards   had 300 necromancers with dark power
4) Barbarian    had 300 aggresiive soldiers with ancient weapons and forsworn weapon
5) Elemental mages  had 300 necromancer and they use weapons too
6) Sram  had 300 darkness skeleton and darkness daedra with the power of the fire so they hate snow and cold
7) Steamer   had 300 elf with a power of the land and the wood they said that they eat everything even bugs
8) Zobal     had 300 little kids its true that they are a beginers but they are a good warriors and wizards and i think that they made there moneys from the imperials so they are under the protect of imperials so they love imperials
9)Osamodas    had 300 cold blue creatures who live in the snow and they hate the fire
10) Enutrof   had 300 old people with the most old generation they had the best experience because they are the old ones they said that they are the real sons of skyrim so they are an old nords and i think that they love the stormcloaks
all those 10 clan can help you and had a beautiful story and you will join one of them in that college there is 15 student beside you so they will be 30 student 3 from sparta 3 from nord hero and 3 from darck wizard also 3 from Barbarian and 3 from elemental mages ect...
 and you will join one of them this is beside the many quests i add and the first quest  is joyning the college of soldiers and you will see the location in pictures and this college is in a new kingdom like whiterun and the others with the name TeeraBethia!!
this is one of my best mods and soon i will add in my version 2 a new quests in this college because i only add 7 quests for now ......
good bye and ENJOY!!!!! and one more time im sorry of my bad english.....













For anyone who like to download my other 17 mods i assure you those mods are so cool
1) Ysgramor and talos followers : ysgramor and talos followers in whiterun http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18655
2) Power of the dovahkiin : a great power http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23033
3) The book of alchemy : its a great book give you a great power in alchemist http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19781
4) new difficulities : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18928
5) Animal kigdom quest : its a verry cool quest against some giant animals like a boss http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18930
6) Robot kingdom quest : its a verry cool quest against giant robots like a boss http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19460
7) the doors of oblivion quest: you must close the doors of oblivion like your father did before in cyrodiil http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18950
8) new whiterun npc : some new npcs in whiterun but not a retx so i dident touch the essensiel ones  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18954
9) new npcs in the other cities windelhelm solitude ect... : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18954
10) Legendary warriors : 10 new strong followers http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23037
11) new basement in hjeriem : just a new basement in hjeriem but with a maze lets see what can you do to get out of the maze : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19073
12) Trainig house :  a great beautiful training house http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23038
13) college of soldiers: a college with many new quests http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19786
14) Godzella : cool godzella the lord of dinossors and you must kill him http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19074
15) Bomb Lazer Bomb tnt : a merchant sell you some bombs you can use it like a war game http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19072
16) kingdom of olds and children: a beautiful kingdom like whiterun and the others http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23039
17) Snow and fire kingdom : a beautiful kingdom like whiterun and the others http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23041
18) Giant kingdom: a beautiful kingdom like whiterun and the others : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23042
ENJOY!!! SKULL 19971
